Function

Function Args

Handler Function Args

Description

GMFSetOnClickHandler

@ref::rFunction

@int::iMenuType, @string::sTile, @int::iID

On left click of mouse, for any tile ID

GMFSetOnOpenHandler

@ref::rFunction

@int::iMenuType

On open of a generic menu, for any tile ID. Note that this function will run before most of the menu is done rendering

GMFSetOnCloseHandler

@ref::rFunction

@int::iMenuType

On close of a generic menu, for any tile ID

GMFSetOnMouseoverHandler

@ref::rFunction

@int::iMenuType, @string::sTile, @int::iID

On mouseover of a tile, for any tile ID

By Menu Type

GMFSetByMenuOnClickHandler

@ref::rFunction, @int::iMenuType

@int::iMenuType, @string::sTile, @int::iID

On left click of mouse on a tile in a specific menu type, for any tile ID

GMFSetByMenuOnOpenHandler

@ref::rFunction, @int::iMenuType

@int::iMenuType

On open of a specific menu type, for any tile ID. Note that this function will run before most of the menu is done rendering

GMFSetByMenuOnCloseHandler

@ref::rFunction, @int::iMenuType

@int::iMenuType

On close of a specific menu type, for any tile ID

GMFSetByMenuOnMouseoverHandler

@ref::rFunction, @int::iMenuType

@int::iMenuType, @string::sTile, @int::iID

On mouseover of a tile in a specific menu type, for any tile ID

By Tile ID

@ref::rFunction, @int::iID

@int::iMenuType, @string::sTile, @int::iID

On left click of mouse, for a specific tile ID

GMFSetOnOpenByIdHandler

@ref::rFunction, @int::iID

@int::iMenuType

On open of a generic menu, for a specific tile ID. Note that this function will run before most of the menu is done rendering

@ref::rFunction, @int::iID

@int::iMenuType

On close of a generic menu, for a specific tile ID

@int::iMenuType, @string::sTile, @int::iID

On left click of mouse on a tile in a specific menu type, for a specific tile ID

@ref::rFunction, @int::iID, @int::iMenuType

@int::iMenuType

@int::iMenuType
